rules_text:
Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Tzelin.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Tzelin: Each opponent loses life equal to Tzelin’s power. If you’re in a renaissance, draw that many cards.
